    Your work getting Laconica up and running is very valuable (because you didn't write it, and thus offer a new perspective to share with the rest of us).

    I'm personally interest in doing some sort of load testing, to help prevent recurrences of twitter's broken growth curve.

    After that, I'm interested in stopping the inevitable spam that will crop up once the federation really works and interoperability takes off.

    Of course, temper this with your previous observation that ideas aren't worth squat.
